subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Although his last win at a Grand Slam came in January 2010, some insiders are picking Roger Federer to win at Wimbledon, which would make him the top-ranked men’s tennis player again.
snippet: Although his last win at a Grand Slam came in January 2010, some insiders are picking Roger Federer to win at Wimbledon, which would make him the top-ranked men’s tennis player again.
